author: Danil Kozyatnikov
comment: 1. Squeeze out all the none English words. There are still plenty.  2. Not sure if its possible, but try to connect to the camera without the phone. New android wear should allow that. 3. Viewfinder in a watch would be a killer feature. I'd pay 10 times for that.
title: Works great, but need some inprovements

author: Joshnstef Osborne
comment: Using hero 3+ silver, HTC one m7, and Moto 360 all up to date.  Decent app gets a little finicky connecting sometimes, and I've noticed the record on/off command doesn't always sync with the camera, even when the app thinks it has.  Also, the modes cycle properly, but the camera always turns off when I try to change settings like resolution and fov.  App is usable, but could certainly stand some help.
title: Passable

author: Ben Pattinson
comment: Watch the video at the top of the page. This should give you enough clues to get it going. I was baffled as to what i was supposed to do. The phone app just sets the camera name and password (gives no feedback as to success). Installing the phone app simultaneously installs a watch app. Go look for it.
title: Really lacking instructions, but shows promise

author: Martin McInulty
comment: Tested with nexus 5, Moto 360 and hero 3 silver and was able to control gopro and change settings.  fonts size a little big but that's just cosmetic.  Thx

reply.author: Go Tic Apps Solutions S.L.
reply.content:
Thank you very much Martin ,
We are working to add more viewing options on the main screen . With your feedback we are energized for improvement.
THANK YOU

title: Nice app

author: Ruslan N
comment: Doesn't work with Xperia Z3. I can connect my gopro (hero3 black) to the phone and to the smartwatch (sony  SW3), I tryed all the variants - but the app doesn' connect to the gopro. I've fill gopro name and password in the phone part of app, then press accept - it says "Guardado" - and that's all. The oficial gopro app in the phone works fine. What should I du to connect gopro tu SW?  UPD: I got connection, but it doesn't 'work properly - changes video resolution to wrong one (not choiced), and after some setting changes (didn't find what depends on, but mostly when swiched to 1080p30) it hangs my gopro, so it shows wrong info on the LCD and doesn't response right (software or camera buttons), only battery disconnectiong helps, camera goes to default settings then. Seems not frendly to gopro3

reply.author: Go Tic Apps Solutions S.L.
reply.content:
Hello Ruslan N,
First , try to connect the phone to the GoPro Hero3 from section access. If you connect either enter the same data in the app . After this open the Clock app and hopes to complete the connection. Do not worry, everything will work.

If problems persist no problem to return the money.

Thank you and we kept in touch .

title: What am I do wrong

author: Sean Rosdahl
comment: Can't seem to get the app on the watch, it's downloaded on the phone, the phone is connected.... but no app on the watch
title: Doesn't work

author: neil blyth
comment: If you could make it work with out having to have phone connected aswell as Sony smart watch 3 has WiFi built in would be 5 star
title: Sony smart watch 3

author: The Feenstras
comment: The record button works but that's about it. Would be nice to have more support for this tiny beast.
title: H4 session with Moto360

author: Jan Ostrówka
comment: Does not work with Hero 5 Black

author: Andres Guzman
comment: Works great on my device controlling my gopro using my Samsung gear live. Good price for the utility.
title: I works great !

author: mario avendano
comment: I was definitely not able to see images. The only settings that worked was changing between camera modes and the red recording button. Its pretty much all I need compared to the gopro remote control that costs way more but I was really expecting all functions working
title: Gopro 4 Silver + LG G Watch + LG G4

author: Darin Sellers
comment: Gopro Hero 3 Black, Galaxy S6.... Also helps if you put things in English (kept getting guardado coming up when trying to connect.) Used my gopro app to double check it works and it does, thus app however does not. Refunded.
title: Doesn't work

author: David Thomas
comment: Should have listened to other people comments... Sony z3 Xperia with lolly pop couldn't pair with app on phone. Displays "I look" for 2 secs and does nothing??
title: Doesn't work

author: J M Chastang Puerma
comment: It doesn't work on samsung s2 classic and they don't tell you that on anywhere.
title: Waste of money

author: Andrii Kolomiichenko
comment: Can't find camera! Create a good manual how to connect.

reply.author: Go Tic Apps Solutions S.L.
reply.content:
La aplicación no es compatible con goPro4, trabajaremos en ello.
Gracias

title: Nexus 5 (Android M) + Moto 360 + GoPro 4 Silver
